001package gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints;
002
003/**
004 * Abstract percentile representation assuring consistent sizing based on viewport width and height, whichever is smaller.
005 */
006public record Percent(double abstractPercent) {
007
008    public static Percent of(double percent){
009        return new Percent(percent);
010    }
011
012    public double fromAbsolute(int width, int height){
013        if(width < height){
014            return this.abstractPercent * width;
015        }
016        return this.abstractPercent * height;
017    }
018
019}
